trans-unit.target: Away<tab>Order pet to leave the battlefield.
Heel<tab>Order pet to follow behind you.
Place<tab>Order pet to move to a specified location.
Stay<tab>Order pet to remain where it is.
Guard<tab>Order pet to refrain from attacking until you attack or are attacked.
Steady<tab>Order pet to refrain from attacking until ordered to do so.
Sic<tab>Order pet to attack.
Obey<tab>Order pet to attack, but refrain from using certain actions until ordered to do so.
Gust<tab>Deals wind damage with a potency of 90.

Backdraft<tab>Deals wind damage with a potency of 80. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Additional Effect:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 15-yalm knockback When <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Obey<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is active, will only execute upon command.

Radiant Shield<tab>Creates a barrier around self and nearby party members. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 20s <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Barrier Effect:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> When barrier is struck, increases striker's physical vulnerability by 2% <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 4s When <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Obey<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is active, will only execute upon command.

Fey Caress<tab>Removes a single detrimental effect from all nearby party members. Some effects cannot be removed. When <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Obey<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is active, will only execute upon command.

Fey Wind<tab>Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay of self and nearby party members by 3%. <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>Duration:<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> 30s When <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Obey<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is active, will only execute upon command.
Offensive Mode<tab>Command autoturret to focus on offensive maneuvers.
Defensive Mode<tab>Command autoturret to focus on supportive maneuvers.
